# Cross product
```{definition}
\begin{align}
\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b} = (a_y \, b_z - a_z \, b_y) \, \widehat{\mathbf{i}} 
\end{align}
```

Notice that the cross product of two vectors is a vector. 

##  Calculation using determinants 

$$\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b} = \left\vert\begin{array}{ccc}
\widehat{\mathbf{i}} & \widehat{\mathbf{j}} & \widehat{\mathbf{k}} \\
a_{x} & a_{y} & a_{z}\\
b_{x} & b_{y} & b_{z}\\
\end{array}\right|$$
